quote: Great event! This is my second time at Muck 'n Mac and I'll definitely be back in 2025. Something for everyone to do in terms of afternoon/ evening activities, as well as the actual routes themselves. It is an extremely well organised event and cannot wait for next year!
Great format and route, good value, genuinely inclusive and fun, lovely people, LOVED the ceilidh!
A lovely site for camping and the amenities were good. The courses were amazing with fantastic scenary and a great mixture of trails. Thank you!
I wasn't sure about the timed stages format but actually really enjoyed it. Only did the first day but great event and well organised.
Really great course and lovely atmosphere to the event. Underestimated area for gravel riding.
Absolutely love this event. This was our 3rd year - what else can I say - a highlight of our busy calendar :-)
Superb event, well organised, great route, friendly staff. Thank you.

An excellent gravel weekend! Everything was well thought of. Event village had clean toilets and hot showers! . Great pizza, ice cream and coffee! Music at night was cracking. Very chilled vibe. Cycling was superb.

First time at Muck n'Mac and it won't be the last - I loved it!!! The whole weekend end was absolutely brilliant from the venue at Traquair House, to the ride courses, to the speakers, the food and the live bands. And all supplemented with such a wonderful chilled and friendly atmosphere.
